data.title: Faith Church Global Missions
data.meta_description:
The ministries of Faith Church of Lafayette, Indiana—a family of Christ
    followers loving God and serving others.
data.text:
About Us

We are Michael and Ashley Emadi. We have three children, Liam, Lorelai, and Méav. We moved to the Republic of Ireland in November of 2014. We live on the Cooley Peninsula in county Louth. There are roughly 20,000 people who live on this peninsula and not a single evangelical church. We are working both as church-planters on the peninsula, alongside an established church in a town about 30 minutes away. Michael is also a part of a radio program called "Heart of the Matter" on local public radio where he and two members of the church get to share the gospel over the radio every Monday.
